scripts.deploy: graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ ultimexfi/blocklytics subgraph.yaml
scripts.deploy:testnet: graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ ultimexfi/blocklytics subgraph.testnet.yaml
scripts.deploy-local: graph deploy --node http://localhost:8020/ --ipfs http://localhost:5001 ultimexfi/blocklytics subgraph.yaml
scripts.deploy-local:testnet: graph deploy --node http://localhost:8020/ --ipfs http://localhost:5001 ultimexfi/blocklytics:testnet subgraph.testnet.yaml
